channel.title: Error on Source
channel.description:
Hey everyone, So basically i've got my source up on my vps, ready to host, port forward works, everything is good. However, When i run my server, I get an error Saying- java.io.FileNotFoundExeption: C;\Users\root\ecogames\test123.bin <the system cannot find the path specified. Can anyone help me with this? I'd really appreciate it and will most likely send you some money on paypal for your help. Thanks for reading,
Jordan6203.

item.title: Error on Source

Hey everyone, So basically i’ve got my source up on my vps, ready to host, port forward works, everything is good. However, When i run my server, I get an error Saying- java.io.FileNotFoundExeption: C;\Users\root\ecogames\test123.bin <the system cannot find the path specified. Can anyone help me with this?
